title: Chelsee Healey puts on a leggy display in neon pink dress with matching stiletto boots
text:
She is the popular Hollyoaks actress who always puts on a stylish display.

And Chelsee Healey caught the eye as she stepped out in a neon pink ensemble in Manchester on Saturday,

The soap star, 31, commanded attention as she flaunted her honed legs in an 80s inspired hot pink dress with a thigh-skimming hem.

Work it: Chelsee Healey caught the eye as she stepped out in a neon pink ensemble in Manchester on Saturday

She paired this with matching pink ankle boots and a pastel pink handbag.

Her brunette locks were worn in a glossy sidepart while fluttery lashes and berry gloss accentuated her gorgeous features.

It comes after it emerged she dated Love Island runner-up Tommy Fury after bumping into him in a club earlier this summer.

The Mirror reported in June that while Tommy failed to get Chelsee's number, he messaged her on Instagram.

Leggy: The soap star, 31, commanded attention as she flaunted her honed legs in an 80s inspired hot pink dress with a thigh-skimming hem

Radiant: Her brunette locks were worn in a glossy sidepart while fluttery lashes and berry gloss accentuated her gorgeous features

Strut: The star was hitting the town on a night out with a glamorous pal

She is said to have eventually replied to him and they went on one date but 'smitten' Tommy is said to have felt she was 'out of his league.'

Meanwhile, Chelsee recently broke down while discussing claims she's an unfit mother after exhibiting frosty behaviour on Celebs Go Dating in an interview with The Sun.

She said: 'Of the upsetting things I've read, the stuff that really gets to me is when they bring my baby into it. I've had a lot of nasty comments. You can say whatever you want about me, but don't bring my daughter into it.

Chelsee, who shares 20-month-old daughter Coco with former partner Jack Malloy, insisted she is a good mother.

She continued: 'I know I'm a good mum. I'd never teach her to have bad manners, because that's not me either. I'm not nasty. I'd never treat someone how I wouldn't want to be treated, I've not been brought up like that. I'd bring my daughter up with the same values.'
description: Chelsee Healey caught the eye as she stepped out in a neon pink ensemble in Manchester on Saturday,
